game_description: Gorilla playground is a new gorilla locomotion vr game were you can play horror(Recommended) or shop for cosmetics(free) or just hang out and talk. Change your name to whatever you want so people can recognise you and we have a whole community you can play with if your lonely! Gamemodes! Horror(Available to play) Football(Coming-Soon) Casual(Available to play) Backrooms(Coming-Soon) Tag(Coming-Soon)
review_1: Ive been wondering if there is spots open for moderator in the game and I wonder can I be one Ive never been an actual moderator unless it was on roblox or tiktok on lives. So I wonder can I be one in a VR game?
review_2: I was searching for gorilla tag analogue when I saw this game gorilla tag was hard for me and I downloaded this I remember it from beginning when I was robot with strange circles I was seeing in front of me but now I’m happy to watch how game progressed multiplayer, cosmetics, voice chat, game modes. In nutshell I recommend this game to play. ;) Good Luck
review_3: This game started as one of the worst games and then it turned into one of the best good job visual
review_4: HEY kopcrew when do I get mod when your done swimming? Also guys I’m friends with the owner so I’m getting mod not trying to flex
review_5: Can I be mod I will shout out game
